data.title: Maltagenealogy
data.meta_description: Announcement Page Announcements of Noble births, engagements, deaths and ennoblement. We welcome updates to Maltese descendants of the Maltese nobility and those of Foreign nobility, descendants of Political leaders, or relations to Bishops. Extended to all those descendants of the Maltese nobility and those of Foreign nobility. Recommence February 2021, though announcements go back as […]
data.text:
“Grimaldi di Genoa”

All Corrections/Additions are Welcome

Last update: 15-03-2023.

Otto Canella, Consul of Genoa 1162, 1170, 1184,
